title: Research Data Analyst - Invest in Open Infrastructure
description: [Invest in Open Infrastructure](https://investinopen.org/) (IOI) is seeking a **Research Data Analyst** to join our growing team and help us shed light on the current flows of capital and costs associated with funding and maintaining open infrastructure in higher education. This position will play a pivotal role in accelerating our work to provide in-depth analysis for institutional decision makers, infrastructure providers, and funders on the hidden costs of open infrastructure for research and scholarship.
